body:
### Spack version
0.14.1

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install netcdf-c@4.6.2
==> 35562: Installing netcdf-c
==> Fetching https://www.gfd-dennou.org/arch/netcdf/unidata-mirror/netcdf-c-4.6.2.tar.gz

curl: (22) The requested URL returned error: 404 Not Found
==> Failed to fetch file from URL: https://www.gfd-dennou.org/arch/netcdf/unidata-mirror/netcdf-c-4.6.2.tar.gz
    URL https://www.gfd-dennou.org/arch/netcdf/unidata-mirror/netcdf-c-4.6.2.tar.gz was not found!
==> Fetching from https://www.gfd-dennou.org/arch/netcdf/unidata-mirror/netcdf-c-4.6.2.tar.gz failed.
==> Error: FetchError: All fetchers failed for spack-stage-netcdf-c-4.6.2-k35zgwrkyyiqm76qbly72fh3u3gxov6c
```
### Additional information
The issue is stemming from the mirror site https://www.gfd-dennou.org/arch/netcdf/unidata-mirror no longer hosting some of the older packages of netcdf. These packages are still hosted on netcdf's github page. I'm really opening this issue to suggest a change of the primary download url for netcdf-c to the official github releases page for the project.
title: Installation issue: netcdf-c older versions no longer hosted on mirror site
